text: Arau yadi tumi dekhilahemtena, yetiya sihamtaka sihamtara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya karaoraa ha’ba, te'om ka’ba, ‘e'ito prakrta satya nahaya jano’? Sihamte ka’ba, ‘amara pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya eya satya’. Te'om ka’ba, ‘tente tomaloke yi kupharai karaichila tara babe tomaloke etiya sasti bhoga karaa’
